install.name: Custom Properties Tags Plugin
install.author: Andrea Forghieri
install.copyright: (C) 2007-2011 Andrea Forghieri, Solidsystem - http://www.solidsystem.it All rights reserved.
install.description: Adds Custom Properties tags to content items.

param.name: tags_position
param.label: Tags position
param.description: Sets the position of the tags in the article. If set to 'Custom' , the plugin will replace {cptags} in the article with the tags. Default: bottom.

param.name: tag_in_meta
param.label: Append tag to meta keywords
param.description: If Yes, tags are appended to meta keywords. Default: Yes.
